articles.title: 14 Players Who Could Be Packers’ First-Round Picks - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Who could be first-round options for the Green Bay Packers? Conversations with scouts led to this 14-player list, which includes three receivers and 10 players on defense.
articles.content:
